Name: Abridge
Description: Abridge provides AI-powered tools to document medical conversations, helping healthcare providers focus on patient care rather than note-taking.

Name: Adept
Description: Develops AI models capable of executing complex tasks across different domains by interpreting human instructions.

Name: Anduril Industries
Description: Focused on developing autonomous defense systems and surveillance tools, including drones and virtual border monitoring systems.

Name: Anthropic
Description: Specialises in building interpretable and reliable AI systems, such as language models, with a focus on AI safety and alignment with human values.

Name: Anyscale
Description: Provides tools to simplify the deployment, scaling, and management of distributed AI and machine learning applications on any infrastructure.

Name: AssemblyAI
Description: Offers APIs for automatic speech-to-text transcription and audio intelligence, enabling developers to build apps with voice recognition capabilities.

Name: Baseten
Description: A platform for deploying machine learning models into production without requiring extensive backend development or infrastructure expertise.

Name: Cerebras Systems
Description: Builds cutting-edge AI compute hardware, including the Cerebras Wafer-Scale Engine, to accelerate machine learning and deep learning workloads.

Name: Character.AI
Description: Offers personalised conversational AI tools, allowing users to create chatbot 'characters' for entertainment, education, or task automation.

Name: Cleanlab
Description: Focuses on improving the quality of training data for machine learning models by identifying and fixing errors in datasets automatically.

Name: Codeium
Description: Provides AI-powered code autocompletion tools that integrate with popular IDEs to speed up development and reduce repetitive coding tasks.

Name: Cohere
Description: Develops large language models (LLMs) that power natural language processing tasks like text summarisation, classification, and generation for enterprise use.

Name: Cradle
Description: Uses AI to predict and design proteins for pharmaceutical and biotech applications, accelerating drug discovery and development.

Name: Cresta
Description: AI-driven platform that enhances productivity and effectiveness of customer support and sales teams through real-time coaching and analytics.

Name: Databricks
Description: Unified data platform that enables organisations to perform analytics, machine learning, and big data processing in one collaborative environment.

Name: DeepL
Description: Offers AI-powered translation tools that produce high-quality translations, widely considered more accurate than competitors like Google Translate.

Name: ElevenLabs
Description: Develops lifelike AI text-to-speech solutions that enable content creators and enterprises to create synthetic voices with natural intonation and emotion.

Name: Figure AI
Description: Focuses on building general-purpose humanoid robots for use in labour-intensive environments, such as manufacturing and logistics.

Name: Glean
Description: Provides an enterprise search engine that integrates with various tools to help employees find information and documents across platforms.

Name: Harvey
Description: Custom-built AI for legal professionals, offering tools for drafting, summarising, and reviewing legal documents with accuracy and efficiency.

Name: Hebbia
Description: Combines AI with search to deliver semantic, context-aware insights across enterprise knowledge bases, enabling faster decision-making.

Name: Hugging Face
Small Description: Library for AI models and datasets
Description: Hosts open-source AI models, datasets, and tools for building NLP, machine learning, and generative AI applications.

Name: Insitro
Description: Uses AI and machine learning to accelerate the discovery of new drugs by integrating biological and clinical data for predictive modelling.

Name: Kumo.AI
Description: Offers AI-powered software for predictive data analytics and decision-making, helping organisations uncover actionable insights from their data.

Name: LangChain
Description: Provides a framework for developers to build applications powered by large language models (LLMs) with integrated workflows and memory.

Name: Leonardo.AI
Description: Offers AI tools for creating images, 3D assets, and generative content for creative professionals in gaming and design industries.

Name: MidJourney
Description: Provides generative AI tools for creating high-quality, artistic images, commonly used in creative industries and marketing.

Name: Mistral AI
Description: Develops open-source generative AI models to democratise access to powerful AI tools, enabling researchers and developers to build on its innovations.

Name: Notion
Description: A collaborative workspace that integrates notes, tasks, and databases, enhanced by AI tools to improve team productivity.

Name: OpenAI
Description: Develops advanced AI systems like GPT and DALL-E, offering capabilities in natural language processing, image generation, and AI research.

Name: Owkin
Description: Combines AI and medical research to accelerate drug development and precision medicine, focusing on oncology and rare diseases.

Name: Perplexity
Description: An AI-powered search engine that provides accurate, summarised answers and explanations to user queries.

Name: Photoroom
Description: Offers AI-based photo editing tools to create professional-grade visuals, including removing backgrounds and enhancing product images.

Name: Pika
Description: Provides AI-driven video creation tools for automating video generation with customisable templates and realistic voiceovers.

Name: Pinecone
Description: Offers vector database solutions for AI applications, enabling efficient similarity searches for embeddings used in machine learning and recommendation systems.

Name: Replicate
Description: Provides a platform for deploying machine learning models into production, making it simple for developers to integrate AI into apps.

Name: Rosebud AI
Description: Creates AI tools for generating game assets and characters, simplifying the production of creative content for game developers.

Name: Runway
Description: Offers AI-powered creative tools for video editing, green screen effects, and content creation, enabling faster workflows for creators.

Name: Sana
Description: Provides AI-powered learning management systems and enterprise search tools to streamline training and information discovery in organisations.

Name: Scale AI
Description: Delivers high-quality data annotation services and infrastructure for machine learning models, with applications in autonomous vehicles and AI training.

Name: Sierra
Description: Develops AI-powered customer service platforms that provide predictive assistance and improve response times for enterprise clients.

Name: Synthesia
Description: Offers tools to create AI-generated video content with customisable avatars, often used for training, marketing, or explainer videos.

Name: Together AI
Description: Builds tools for collaborative AI model development, enabling organisations to share, train, and deploy models efficiently.

Name: Tome
Description: Provides AI-assisted tools for creating engaging presentations and storytelling, integrating text, images, and data seamlessly.

Name: Tractian
Description: Offers AI-powered predictive maintenance solutions for industrial machines, reducing downtime and improving operational efficiency.

Name: Unstructured
Description: Provides tools for processing and extracting information from unstructured data, helping businesses derive actionable insights.

Name: Vannevar Labs

Name: Waabi

Name: Weaviate

Name: Writer
